text: Inspire Brands is an American fast-food restaurant franchise company. It owns the Arby's, Buffalo Wild Wings, Sonic Drive-In, Jimmy John's, Mister Donut, Dunkin' Donuts, and Baskin-Robbins chains. It has 31,700 locations and US$30 billion in system sales. It was formed when Arby's Restaurant Group merged with Buffalo Wild Wings on February 5, 2018. Category:American fast food restaurants Category:American food companies Category:2018 establishments in the United States
title: Inspire Brands
